title: The Uncalled
author: Paul Laurence Dunbar
description: A man finds himself forced into religious life.
longDescription: The Uncalled tells the story of Frederick Brent, a man abandoned by his father and orphaned at an young age, who sees himself thrust into religious life by his devout guardian despite his lack of vocation for it.
The Uncalled was Paul Laurence Dunbar's first novel. It was neither a critical nor a commercial success, as it was overshadowed by his more successful novel The Sport of the Gods.
rights: The source text and artwork in this ebook are believed to be in the United States public domain; that is, they are believed to be free of copyright restrictions in the United States.
